articles.title: Do you feel happy in your country?
articles.description:
Every one of us, at some point of time in our life, was wondering what is happiness formula? Power? Wealth? Health? Others?
Being inspired by this question, we decide to explore it and hopefully we can dig out some insights.
articles.contents:
Motivation
As countries get richer, we may assume that people become happier .Our Visualization aims to first show the trends of World Happiness from 2015 to 2020 for different countries, and its correlation with other factors such as Economic, Family, Freedom and Health etc.
Objective
We aim to present this view with a series of charts including:
Bar chart of the different factors
Linear correlation chart between the Happiness index and other variables
Heatmap of the variables
Interactive World Happiness Map with animations for 2015~2020
Data Visualization Approaches
We aim to present this view with a series of charts including: We aim to present this view with a series of charts including: We aim to present this view with a series of charts including: We aim to present this view with a series of charts including:
Prototypes of the Data Visualization
Linear chart (Happiness Score vs.Â GDP Per Capita) 
Gantt Chart of Happiness Score across different regions/countries 
Happiness Score broken down by various factors
